summary: The Sveriges Riksbank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel, informally called the Nobel Prize in Economics, is a prize awarded each year for outstanding contributions in the field of economics.
full_text: Sveriges Riksbank, or simply Riksbanken, is the central bank of Sweden. It is the world's oldest central bank and the 3rd oldest bank still in operation. It is sometimes called the Swedish National Bank or the Bank of Sweden .
title: Sveriges Riksbank
